alert.note: Alert for Las Animas (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 19 at 4:14PM MDT until July 19 at 4:45PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Las Animas County in southeastern Colorado... * Until 445 PM MDT. * At 413 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 14 miles southwest of Kim, or 28 miles northeast of Des Moines, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Las Animas County. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
